properties.name: ingest.mqtt.broker.ip
properties.description: The IP address of the MQTT broker to connect to

properties.name: ingest.mqtt.broker.port
properties.description: The port of the MQTT broker to connect to

properties.name: ingest.mqtt.client.id
properties.description: The client id to use when connecting to the MQTT broker

properties.name: ingest.notifier.enabled
properties.description: Whether or not to enable the notifier

properties.name: ingest.notifier.discord.webhook.url
properties.description: The Discord webhook URL to use for notifications

properties.name: ingest.notifier.cpu-temperature.threshold
properties.description: The threshold for the CPU temperature to trigger a notification
